english.segment1: God of wrath. God of love. God of Earth. And God above. God of hope. God of peace. God of you. And God of me [2x]
english.segment2: Chorus: My love for You. My heart for You. My life for You. All I am for You [2x]
english.segment3: Bridge: Blood through my veins for You. I give my world to You. All I am and all I have. I lay it down for You. Dancing 'round with You. Spinning 'round with You. Laughing loud with You. My love
